languages.text: "Арена будет тебе ответом на оскорбление суда. Арена сдерет твои титулы вместе с кожей, а чужие удары перемелют гордость и кости. Только кровь и страдания помогут смыть тот позор, что дракон навлек на себя сегодня!"

"The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"
languages.original_text: "Арена будет тебе ответом на оскорбление суда. Арена сдерет твои титулы вместе с кожей, а чужие удары перемелют гордость и кости. Только кровь и страдания помогут смыть тот позор, что дракон навлек на себя сегодня!"

traits.locale_text: "The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

"The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

"The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

"The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

"The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

languages.text: “你侮辱了黑曜王庭，你要去竞技场里接受惩罚。竞技场会剥夺你的头衔，剥掉你的皮肉；角斗士的猛击会打断你的骨头，打碎你的骄傲。只有鲜血与苦难，才能洗刷裁决官今日为他自己带来的耻辱！”
languages.original_text: "The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

traits.locale_text: “你侮辱了黑曜王庭，你要去竞技场里接受惩罚。竞技场会剥夺你的头衔，剥掉你的皮肉；角斗士的猛击会打断你的骨头，打碎你的骄傲。只有鲜血与苦难，才能洗刷裁决官今日为他自己带来的耻辱！”

languages.text: "Die Arena wird Euch für diese Beleidigung dem Hof gegenüber zur Rechenschaft ziehen. Die Arena wird Euch Eure Titel und Eure Haut wegreißen, und die Hiebe der Kämpfer werden Eure Knochen und Euren Stolz brechen. Nur Blut und Leid können die Schande wegwaschen, die der Dracon an diesem Tag über sich gebracht hat!"
languages.original_text: "The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Arena wird Euch für diese Beleidigung dem Hof gegenüber zur Rechenschaft ziehen. Die Arena wird Euch Eure Titel und Eure Haut wegreißen, und die Hiebe der Kämpfer werden Eure Knochen und Euren Stolz brechen. Nur Blut und Leid können die Schande wegwaschen, die der Dracon an diesem Tag über sich gebracht hat!"

languages.text: « Vous répondrez de cette insulte à la cour dans l'arène. Elle vous dépouillera de vos titres aussi bien que de votre peau, et les coups de vos adversaires auront raison de vos os et de votre orgueil. Seuls le sang et la souffrance pourront laver le déshonneur que le pitoyable dracon s'est attiré en ce jour ! »
languages.original_text: "The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous répondrez de cette insulte à la cour dans l'arène. Elle vous dépouillera de vos titres aussi bien que de votre peau, et les coups de vos adversaires auront raison de vos os et de votre orgueil. Seuls le sang et la souffrance pourront laver le déshonneur que le pitoyable dracon s'est attiré en ce jour ! »

languages.text: «La arena te hará pagar por este insulto al tribunal. La arena te despojará de tus títulos y de tu piel, mientras que los golpes de tus oponentes quebrantarán tus huesos y tu orgullo. ¡Solo la sangre y el sufrimiento pueden lavar la vergüenza que el Dracón ha hecho caer sobre sí mismo en este día!».
languages.original_text: "The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

traits.locale_text: «La arena te hará pagar por este insulto al tribunal. La arena te despojará de tus títulos y de tu piel, mientras que los golpes de tus oponentes quebrantarán tus huesos y tu orgullo. ¡Solo la sangre y el sufrimiento pueden lavar la vergüenza que el Dracón ha hecho caer sobre sí mismo en este día!».

languages.text: 「アリーナは法廷で侮辱されたことを黙ってはいないでしょう。アリーナはあなたの称号と皮膚を剥ぎ取り、対戦相手はあなたの骨とプライドを砕くでしょう。ドラコンが自らにもたらした恥辱を洗い流すのは、血と苦しみ以外ないのだから！」
languages.original_text: "The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

traits.locale_text: 「アリーナは法廷で侮辱されたことを黙ってはいないでしょう。アリーナはあなたの称号と皮膚を剥ぎ取り、対戦相手はあなたの骨とプライドを砕くでしょう。ドラコンが自らにもたらした恥辱を洗い流すのは、血と苦しみ以外ないのだから！」

languages.text: "Mahkemeye yönelttiğin hakaretlerin bedelini arenada ödeyeceksin. Arena hem ünvanlarını hem de derini söküp alacak. Katılımcıların darbeleri hem kemiklerini hem de gururunu kıracak. Drakon'un bugün kendi kendine yaşattığı utancı yalnızca kan ve acı temizleyecek!"
languages.original_text: "The arena will make you answer for this insult to the court. The arena will strip you of your titles and your skin, and the contenders' blows will break your bones and your pride. Nothing but blood and suffering will wash away the shame the Dracon has brought upon himself this day!"

traits.locale_text: "Mahkemeye yönelttiğin hakaretlerin bedelini arenada ödeyeceksin. Arena hem senin ünvanlarını söküp alacak, hem de derini. Katılımcıların darbeleri hem kemiklerini kıracak hem de gururunu. Drakon'un bugün kendi kendine yaşattığı utancı temizleyecek olan şey yalnızca kan ve acı olacak!"
